translations.english: Xiang Liang summoned all his deputy generals.

translations.chinese: 六月，沛公如薛，與項梁共立楚懷王孫心為楚懷王。
translations.english: In the sixth month, Pei Gong went to Xue and together with Xiang Liang established Chu King Huai's grandson Xin as King Huai of Chu.

translations.chinese: 章邯破殺魏王 咎、齊王田儋於臨濟。
translations.english: Zhang Han defeated and killed King Jiu of Wei and King Tian Dan of Qi at Linji.
In the seventh month, there was heavy continuous rain.
